column5: Hey all, I'm from South Western Ontario, I'm a brook trout maniac. My home water is the Upper Credit River. I've been fly fishing for 40 years and still can't get enough of it. Currently on vacation in Batchawana bay and have only caught two trout in a week! Need suggestions please! Nice sunny weather though so I'm not complaining!
I don't know that area so I won't be much help...but welcome and good luck.
I wouldn't be able to tell the difference between a Brook Trout and a Trouser Trout so I am of no help, but welcome to the forum regardless. Where is Batchewana?
Welcome aboard. If you can - head up the road a bit to Lake Superior Provincial Park.. You'll probably figure the rest out by yourself.
See everyone here is alot more friendly if you introduce yourself instead of just taking info. Welcome and PM sent.
spincast is right, spent a great deal of my life in the area and welcome , there are many amazing talented  and caring people on this board

Hey all, I'm from South Western Ontario, I'm a brook trout maniac. My home water is the Upper Credit River. I've been fly fishing for 40 years and still can't get enough of it. Currently on vacation in Batchawana bay and have only caught two trout in a week! Need suggestions please! Nice sunny weather though so I'm not complaining!  Slooow down there sonny, I've never caught a brook trout in my life, so I need suggestions from YOU!  I wouldn't be able to tell the difference between a Brook Trout and a Trouser Trout so I am of no help, but welcome to the forum regardless. Where is Batchewana?  Lake Superior:  46.923348, -84.596985
